OOC: God you're dumb!  Look people, just because a character may not be the=
 same character as another person's, doesn't mean they can still have the s=
ame name!  Because then it gets confusing, and if the person who makes a ch=
aracter of the same name as a character already taken or made tries to say =
that it is not the same, then they sound stupid.  So change your characters=
' names dummy!
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Legendarynemasis@aol=
.com 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, June 02, 2001 11:46 P=
M
  Subject: Re: The X-Predacons hope


  The Skywarp I control isnt the sa=
me one as yours. And the gigatron thats 
  being used is off in the future =
and isnt officially a char since he is only 
  used once in a great long wh=
ile. 
        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
